input_email_body:
Subject: Inquiry About Billing Structure Details

Hello Customer Support, I am reaching out to inquire about the billing structure of the SaaS platform. Could you provide detailed information on the different payment options available? Specifically, I would appreciate it if you could include any discounts for long-term commitments or bulk purchases. Additionally, please let me know about any additional fees for services, support, and maintenance My name is Elena Ivanova.. I am looking forward to hearing back and understanding the pricing model for the platform. Thank you in advance for your assistance. I am looking forward to your response. You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.
